tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_skill_gap_analysis (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    job_title VARCHAR(50),
    skills_needed VARCHAR(100),
    current_skills VARCHAR(100),
    recommended_learning_path VARCHAR(200)
)

CREATE TABLE employee_skills (
  employee_id INT,
  skill_id INT,
  skill_level INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (skill_id) REFERENCES skills(skill_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeSkills (
    employee_id INT,
    skill_id INT,
    proficiency_level INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, skill_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (skill_id) REFERENCES Skills(skill_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Employee (EmployeeID INT PRIMARY KEY, Name VARCHAR(50), Department VARCHAR(50), SkillLevel INT);
CREATE TABLE Skill (SkillID INT PRIMARY KEY, SkillName VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE EmployeeSkill (EmployeeID INT, SkillID INT, SkillLevel INT, FOREIGN KEY (EmployeeID) REFERENCES Employee(EmployeeID), FOREIGN KEY (SkillID) REFERENCES Skill(SkillID));
CREATE TABLE LearningPath (PathID INT PRIMARY KEY, PathName VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE PathSkill (PathID INT, SkillID INT, OrderNum INT, FOREIGN KEY (PathID) REFERENCES LearningPath(PathID), FOREIGN KEY (SkillID) REFERENCES Skill(SkillID));
